name: WBBYO - ¡an arcade local coop game!
description:
WBBYO Is a new Wild Guns Based Project with a 8bit styled graphics

the game could be played with 1 or 2 players (that could be changed on options and has a tiny tutorial to understand some new mechanics (like dash system or secondary attack)

Local Coop Mode

Local cooperative is implemented in this game with 2 controllers
simultaneously and has some differences respect the single player Mode

  • ¡New Opportunity PowerUp!: in multiplayer you have a powerup to reanimate your teammate
  • Cursors are slower Than single player

Single Player Mode

Single player mode is played with mouse and keyboard. It's just the singleplayer mode
